word_group.brief_definition: 尴尬时刻；尴尬的瞬间；难堪的时刻
尴尬的消息；尴尬的信息
令人尴尬的意外；尴尬的事件

bilingual.source: The silence after his joke was quite embarrassing.
bilingual.target: 他的笑话之后的沉默非常令人尴尬的。

bilingual.source: It was embarrassing when her phone rang during the meeting.
bilingual.target: 她的手机在会议中响了，这真是令人尴尬的。

bilingual.source: His attempt to dance was more embarrassing than entertaining.
bilingual.target: 他的舞蹈尝试比起娱乐更是令人尴尬的。

bilingual.source: She found it embarrassing to trip in front of her colleagues.
bilingual.target: 她在同事面前绊倒了，觉得非常令人尴尬的。

bilingual.source: It was embarrassing when he forgot his lines during the play.
bilingual.target: 他在演出时忘词了，这真是令人尴尬的。
他说了一句令人尴尬的话。

bilingual.source: It can be very hard to forget embarrassing moments.
bilingual.target: 忘记令人尴尬的时刻很难。

bilingual.source: This seems to be embarrassing to a CBD position.
bilingual.target: 这似乎是令人尴尬的一个生物多样性公约的立场。

bilingual.source: There was an embarrassing silence after his joke.
bilingual.target: 他讲完笑话之后，是一阵令人尴尬的沉默。

bilingual.source: Start now and avoid the embarrassing phone call from their teacher later.
bilingual.target: 从现在做起，避免日后接到老师打来的令人尴尬的电话。

yingyinNormal.en: Higher or lower than what? This is embarrassing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么东西向上或是向下？

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, babe. Kind of embarrassing me in front of my friends.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，宝贝儿，你让我在朋友面前有些难堪。

yingyinNormal.en: No! Go away. You're embarrassing me in front of 8-year-olds. Sorry.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有！走开啦，你让我在一群8岁小孩面前丢脸了。抱歉。

yingyinNormal.en: America, what you done to these Koreans? This is a little embarrassing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 美国人，看看你对这些北韩人做了些什么？真让我觉得羞耻。

yingyinNormal.en: She really needs to tone down on the social niceties. It's embarrassing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她真该改改她的大小姐脾气，搞的挺尴尬的。

yingyinNormal.en: So? Well, it's embarrassing. People were looking at us like we were crazy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以呢？很尴尬，别人都当我们是疯子。

yingyinNormal.en: It's gonna be really embarrassing. You? My dad is on his belated honeymoon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这下真的太尴尬了。你呢？我爸爸正在度蜜月。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, that's right. He called to ask out Monica. That's gotta be embarrassing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 原来如此，他是要约莫妮卡，真是尴尬。

yingyinNormal.en: Wow. This is kind of embarrassing. I was actually coming over to talk to your friend.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这真的是很尴尬，事实上，我想跟你朋友说话。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh hey, no, you're not welcome. Okay, look, I hate this. You guys keep embarrassing me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这里不欢迎你，我讨厌这样，你们害我拼命出丑。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, this is very embarrassing. Dr. Lorvis, I am so sorry. I did not mean to lead you on.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这太尴尬了，乐维斯医生，真的很抱歉，我不是故意让你误会的。

yingyinNormal.en: You'll be forcing him out of his job, embarrassing him, making him come to you to apologize.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你将逼他离职，让他难堪，逼他跟你道歉。

yingyinNormal.en: Mummy, she believes the other dress is for her. Poor, slow, little Cinders. How embarrassing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 妈咪，她以为多出来的那礼服是给她的呢。可怜又迟钝的灰姑娘啊。多么尴尬啊！

yingyinNormal.en: Leslie? No, no. What, are you kidding? He asked her out once. It was an embarrassing failure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 莱斯利？没有，怎么可能？他约过她一次，不过尴尬地失败了。

yingyinNormal.en: My marriage fell apart within a year, something that was really embarrassing and painful at the time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一年不到，我的婚姻就以失败告终了。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: I suffered an unfortunate series of embarrassing incidents. I just want a wine bath and to go to sleep.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不幸遭遇了一连串尴尬事件。我只想喝点小酒泡个澡去睡觉。

yingyinNormal.en: But no, okay. No, no, I can see why running with me would be embarrassing to you. Yeah, okay. You're uptight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是好吧，难怪你会觉得跟我跑步很尴尬，你很保守。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, Okay. This is very embarrassing, but I think you've got me confused with a panda named Lotus. My name is Po.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，这下有点尴尬了，我想你认错儿子了，我不叫莲花，我叫阿宝。

yingyinNormal.en: He wasn't? All right. Well, this is embarrassing. Because I had a long conversation with someone who I thought was Tam.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他没来吗？好吧。这就尴尬了。因为我跟一位我以为是丹的人聊了可久了。

yingyinNormal.en: No, you know what? I'm sorry. I really shouldn't have said that you were embarrassing me, I mean that really wasn't cool.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我才抱歉，我不该说你丢我的脸，那样很过份。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 尴尬的；窘的；拮据的；陷入经济困境的
adj. 令人尴尬的；使人难堪的
n. 尴尬；窘；难堪；经济困难；拮据；使人为难（或尴尬）的人

word_family.mean: v. 使尴尬；使窘；陷入经济困境；拮据；妨碍；使困难重重；使复杂化

examination_example.sentence: The emerging consensus around the bill is a sign that legislators are getting frightened about a politically <highlight>embarrassing</highlight> short-term collapse at the USPS.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 围绕议案形成的共识表明，立法者对美国邮政署在政治上令人尴尬的短期崩溃感到惊慌害怕。

examination_example.sentence: But <highlight>embarrassing</highlight> scandals and the popularity of the republican left in the recent Euro-elections have forced him to eat his words and stand down.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但尴尬的丑闻和共和党左派在近期欧洲选举中的大受欢迎使他不得不收回前言，放弃席位。

examination_example.sentence: It is financially terrifying, psychologically <highlight>embarrassing</highlight> and you know that support is minimal and extraordinarily hard to get.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在经济上它令人生畏，在心理感到难堪，并且你还知道，失业救济扶持是微乎其微且非常难以得到。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 尴尬的；窘的；拮据的；陷入经济困境的
adj. 令人尴尬的；使人难堪的
n. 尴尬；窘；难堪；经济困难；拮据；使人为难（或尴尬）的人

word_family.mean: v. 使尴尬；使窘；陷入经济困境；拮据；妨碍；使困难重重；使复杂化

sense_info_list.en: making you feel shy; awkward or ashamed

examination_example.sentence_trans: 他说了一句令人尴尬的话。

examination_example.sentence: People at the back kept calling out "We can't hear. " It was <highlight>embarrassing</highlight>!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 后面的人不停地喊“我们听不见。”太尴尬了！

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>

sense_info_list.zh: 令人难堪的; 令人尴尬的

examination_example.sentence: That evening Rick complained about how <highlight>embarrassing</highlight> they were.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那天晚上，Rick抱怨他们有多尴尬。

examination_example.sentence: Together,the old master and the young beginner changed an <highlight>embarrassing</highlight> situation into a wonderfully creative experience.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 老师傅和年轻的初学者一起把一个尴尬的局面变成了一次奇妙的创造性体验。

word_usage.usage:
embarrassing是以-ing结尾的形容词，意为“令人窘迫的；令人尴尬的”，常用来修饰事或物。
如：She asked a lot of embarrassing questions.
她问了许多令人尴尬的问题。（朗文考试）
